post.body: - I'll give u $100 above MSRP 4 ur Wii Fit.
a Xmas party. Having a conversation w/ an 8 yo girl about a personal trainer. Did I enter the Twilight Zone???
I heard that about GameStop but they need 2 have it in stock now 4 the sale 12/26. My carbon footprint on this is shameful!
I can see why @ron_hudson thinks so highly of you. Looking fwd 2 reading ur blog. Love ur Santa hat!
Tested LG Dare. 20 wpm. Last wk did Storm (24 wpm) & Curve (48 wpm). Touch screen on Storm is fav so far. Will try iPhone & Bold next.
Getting worse. Now *my* 8 yo is saying her cousin is addicted 2 Wii & addicted is "when u r stuck on something." *sighs* They r 2 mature...
4 the record: Twitter is like The Secret. I know it isn't publicly held. But I tweeted so Twitter will go public (then I buy stock). Haha
Eating out w/ Claw. She's watching CNN & says "that guy's on Twitter." I don't watch TV & had no idea Twitter was mainstream. I want stock.
In The LBC-if anyone knows of a GameStop close that has Wii Fit Boards in back 4 12/26 sale (not @dimensionmedia in Florida haha) DM me pls!
My kingdom 4 a Wii Fit Balance Board! Virtual Reality makes practicing real life activities better IMHO. Shawn White game *wants* that Fit!
iPod=no news/ads. I don't touch snail mail *ever* I do play GH3 & read Brogan's blog so news/ads can reach me there. Filters=productivity.
News can't reach me via TV, paper, mags. Sources 4 current events: @zappos, @ev, @jspepper & @mashable via BlackBerry. SometimesYahoo.
24 wpm on Storm (1 hr playing w/ it). Much heralded click screen rocks. 48 wpm on my Curve. Didn't use text shortcuts. Over & out.
Finished product review of Storm. Dif battery/cables than Curve so that blows. Qwerty left side likes left thumb. Fast, sleek. 4.5 stars
Twitter blocked from client's Storm. Some "WebSense" nonsense. Glad cocktail hour didn't start yet or it might have been ugly. *smirks*
Going 2 use the boat ride 2 Catalina Island 2 test drive BlackBerry Storm & determine whether it's upgrade time. Wish I had a Bold here 2...
Ya know...I meant OPN (other people's nudity), not my own. Skype popped up w/ some stranger w/ nude profile pic. I should get Sonexis mebee.
Why Nortel's web.alive? Unlike Skype or SL, no surprise nudity. Mind u, both apps have their place but I'll pass on Rick Roll @ the office!
In Nortel's web.alive auditorium looking @ A/V screens on stage. Think I'll call Tony Robbins ltr-let him know about this Awesome VR tool.
Tweaking my web.alive avatar. @ least I'm consistent in that I care about my avvie regardless of the application. I look like Trinity sweet!
